H0.text: Which artist was famed for his paintings of the water lilies in his garden. Claude Debussy

H1.text: Which artist was famed for his paintings of the water lilies in his garden. Pierre-Auguste Renoir

H2.text: Which artist was famed for his paintings of the water lilies in his garden. John Singer Sargent

H3.text: Which artist was famed for his paintings of the water lilies in his garden. Monet

A4.text: In 1899, he began painting the water lilies that would occupy him continually for the next 20 years of his life

A5.text: The paintings of water lilies in his garden in Giverny, which occupied him for the last 20 years of his life
